message: Let's split it 50/50, no need to negotiate!
You can have a smaller share, but I'm not giving up 500k!
You're getting a bit too greedy, Bob! Let's meet in the middle!
You're getting closer, but I'm still not satisfied with your offer. Can you do better?
I'm not going to give up, Bob! Meet me at 60/40!
You're getting desperate, Alice. This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
Come on, Bob, this is a fair split! Let's end this!
You're really pushing your luck, Alice. This is my last offer, don't expect a better one!
You're not getting the better deal, Bob! I'm taking control!
You're really trying to screw me over, Alice. I'm not going down without a fight!
I'm not afraid of you, Bob! Take it or leave it!
No deal, Alice. I'm taking it all!
